sentences.en: a French film, starring the ubiquitous Gerard Depardieu
sentences.cn: 一部法国电影，由家喻户晓的热拉尔·德帕迪约主演

sentences.en: An ubiquitous virus, encephalomyocarditis , has been demonstrated upon occasion to affect swine.
sentences.cn: 曾经证实一种到处有的病毒-脑心脊炎病毒 -- 偶尔侵害猪.

sentences.en: Both types of organisms are ubiquitous in nature.
sentences.cn: 在自然界中普遍存在两种类型的生物体.

sentences.en: Coffee shops are ubiquitous these days.
sentences.cn: 如今好像到处都是咖啡馆。

sentences.en: He could see the ubiquitous TV cameras.
sentences.cn: 他可以看到那些无处不在的电视摄像机.

sentences.en: Indeed it was first propounded by the ubiquitous Thomas Young.
sentences.cn: 实际上,它是由尽人皆知的杨氏首先提出来的.

sentences.en: It seemed difficult for the celebrity couple to get rid of the ubiquitous paparazzi.
sentences.cn: 这对名人夫妻想要摆脱无所不在的狗仔队似乎很困难。

sentences.en: Nowadays NO PARKING is the most ubiquitous of prohibitions.
sentences.cn: 今天,“NOPARKING”(禁止停车),几乎成了到处可见的禁止用语了.

sentences.en: She is one of the wealthiest, most ubiquitous media personalities around.
sentences.cn: 她是目前最富有、最受媒体追捧的人物之一。

sentences.en: Soil micro - organisms constitute a diverse and ubiquitous group of organisms.
sentences.cn: 土壤微生物是由完全不同的和无孔不入的有机体类群所组成.

sentences.en: The apple is undoubtedly the most ubiquitous of all fruits.
sentences.cn: 苹果无疑是所有果树中栽培最广泛的一种.

sentences.en: The binomial coefficients are ubiquitous in Combinational Theory.
sentences.cn: 二项系数在组合论中有普遍的应用.

sentences.en: The struggle between opposites is ubiquitous.
sentences.cn: 对立面的斗争无所不在.

sentences.en: the ubiquitous bicycles of university towns
sentences.cn: 大学城里处处可见的自行车

sentences.en: The ubiquitous orange and white GSR & L vehicles were assembled on the road outside.
sentences.cn: 橙白二色的金州公司车辆都停在外面的路上.

sentences.en: Vacuoles are ubiquitous in the plant kingdom.
sentences.cn: 在植物界中液泡广泛存在.

sentences.en: We were plagued by the ubiquitous mosquito.
sentences.cn: 我们被无处不在的蚊子所困扰.

words.tran_cn: 普遍存在的；无所不在的

trans.tran_cn: 无所不在的，普遍存在的
trans.tran_en: seeming to be everywhere – sometimes used humorously
